item.title: Flying First Class: is it worth the hype?
item.author: Noppasit Pongsak,
item.description: Back in 2016, when the rest of my family were on holiday in Hong Kong (where I refused to go as I needed to revise for my January exams), my mother said I needed to take some rest by taking some time off as I was working too hard. So I decided to book a last minute flight with Thai Airways to join â€¦
